amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for National Highway Traffic Safety Administration Operations and Research by $4 million, offset by reductions in funding from Salaries and Expenses from the Office of the Secretary.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds an additional $4 million to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's operations and research for use in resolution of auto defects resulting in recalls.
